metadata.dc:author: Pitarch, I
Armengot Carceller, M
Marco Algarra, J
García Bartual, E
Mencheta, E
metadata.dc:description: A brain stem evoked response study is carried out, over a group of tinnitus patient. The purpose of this work is to evidence the electrophysiologic indices indicating tinnitus presence. Morphology tracing alterations, variability in the wave latency, also important decreasing in the amplitude of the wave V were found.
metadata.dc:title: Los potenciales evocados auditivos de tronco cerebral en el estudio de los acúfenos.
[Auditory evoked potentials of the brain stem in the study of tinnitus].
